name: Simon de Varie Kneeling in Prayer
description: Simon de Varie Kneeling in Prayer; Jean Fouquet (French, born about 1415 - 1420, died before 1481); Tours, France; 1455; Tempera colors, gold paint, gold leaf, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 11.4 × 8.3 cm (4 1/2 × 3 1/4 in.); Ms. 7, fol. 2; Partial gift of Gerald F. Borrmann; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Simon de Varie Kneeling in Prayer
medium: Tempera colors, gold paint, gold leaf, and ink on parchment
